alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 18 at 8:51AM HST until January 18 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI HAS BEEN CANCELLED... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND LANAI UNTIL 6 PM HST... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND STILL IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST.... .A moderate size, medium period west northwest swell peaked earlier this morning and has rapidly fallen the past few hours. Thus, the High Surf Warning (HSW) has been downgraded to a High Surf Advisory (HSA) for most smaller island north and west-facing shores through today. There has been a significant enough westerly component to this swell to maintain warning level surf along various points of the leeward Big Island kona coastline. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR MOST NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES UNTIL 6 PM HST... * WHAT...Surf heights 15 to 20 feet along north-facing shores and 8 to 12 feet along west-facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Maui and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala
